item.title: Rabbitmq Tutorial
item.description: Before I write about Rabbitmq, let’s briefly talk about what message queues are in the first place. Message Queue is a programming paradigm which is used for inter process communication where proceses are running either on the same machine or on different machines. When your design requires loose coupling between components, a part of your solution has a cpu intensive operation which can be delgated to a background process, you have to notify multiple components of a certain event then message queue is the solution that you would like to consider for your project.
